mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(nonfileid,"") AS nonfileid,IFNULL(title,"") AS title, IFNULL(formsubmitperson,"") AS formsubmitperson,IFNULL(infokind,"") AS infokind, IFNULL(content,"") AS content, IFNULL(attachmentpath,"") AS attachmentpath, IFNULL(submitperson,"") AS submitperson,IFNULL(submittime,"") AS submittime, IFNULL(officeperson,"") AS officeperson,IFNULL(officecontent,"") AS officecontent, IFNULL(officetime,"") AS officetime,IFNULL(status,"") AS status FROM nonfilemanagement WHERE nonfileid = #{nonfileid}
